attributes.action: build a tube station in Kingston upon Thames, Surrey so that its 150.000 inhabitants gain easier access to central London, thus incresing the town and its businesses wealth.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Kingston upon Thames has no tube station and its inhabitants are required to take a bus either to Wimbledon Station or Richmond Station to travel to central London. Building a tube station in Kingston would benefit the community by providing its people with a better way to travel in to London and as a result of that attract more people to live in Kingston and to set up business in Kingston.
